"[989-he]

" [Harriet]102-harriet ! "[307-his mother] exclaimed [[his]989-he mother]307-his mother . " [Harriet]102-harriet shall go too . [Harriet]102-harriet , now , will be invaluable ! "[307-his mother] And before [Philip]172-philip had stopped talking nonsense , [she]307-his mother had planned the whole thing and was looking out the trains .

Chapter 6

[Italy]8-italy , [Philip]172-philip had always maintained , is only [her]307-his mother true self in the height of the summer , when [the tourists]991-the tourists have left [her]307-his mother , and [her]307-his mother soul awakes under the beams of a vertical sun . [He]172-philip now had every opportunity of seeing [her]307-his mother at [her]307-his mother best , for it was nearly the middle of August before [he]172-philip went out to meet [Harriet]102-harriet in [the Tirol]71-the tirol .

[He]172-philip found [[his]172-philip sister]304-his sister in [a dense cloud five thousand feet above [the sea]994-the sea]993-a dense cloud five thousand feet above the sea , chilled to the bone , overfed , bored , and not at all unwilling to be fetched away .

" It upsets [one]289-one 's plans terribly , "[307-his mother] [she]307-his mother remarked , as [she]307-his mother squeezed out [her]307-his mother sponges , " but obviously it is [my]307-his mother duty . "[307-his mother]

" Did [mother]1749-mother explain it all to [you]307-his mother ? "[172-philip] asked [Philip]172-philip .

" Yes , indeed ! [Mother]115-mother has written [me]307-his mother a really beautiful letter . [She]115-mother describes how it was that [she]115-mother gradually got to feel that [we]2214-we must rescue [the poor baby]2215-the poor baby from its terrible surroundings , how [she]115-mother has tried by letter , and it is no good - nothing but insincere compliments and hypocrisy came back . Then [she]115-mother says , ' There is nothing like personal influence ; [you]172-philip and [Philip]172-philip will succeed where [I]307-his mother have failed . ' [She]115-mother says , too , that [Caroline Abbott]107-miss abbott has been wonderful . "[307-his mother]

[Philip]172-philip assented .

" [Caroline]107-miss abbott feels it as keenly almost as [us]2214-we . That is because [she]107-miss abbott knows [the man]370-the man . Oh , [he]370-the man must be loathsome ! Goodness [me]307-his mother ! [I]307-his mother 've forgotten to pack the ammonia ! ... It has been a terrible lesson for [Caroline]107-miss abbott , but [I]307-his mother fancy it is [her]107-miss abbott turning - point . [I]307-his mother ca n't help liking to think that out of all this evil good will come . "[307-his mother]

[Philip]172-philip saw no prospect of good , nor of beauty either . But the expedition promised to be highly comic . [He]172-philip was not averse to it any longer ; [he]172-philip was simply indifferent to all in it except the humours . These would be wonderful . [Harriet]102-harriet , worked by [[her]102-harriet mother]270-her mother ; [Mrs. Herriton]104-mrs. herriton , worked by [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott ; [Gino]144-gino , worked by a cheque - what better entertainment could [he]172-philip desire ? There was nothing to distract [him]172-philip this time ; [his]172-philip sentimentality had died , so had [his]172-philip anxiety for [the family]266-the family honour . [He]172-philip might be [a puppet]997-a puppet 's puppet , but [he]172-philip knew exactly the disposition of the strings .

[They]998-they travelled for thirteen hours down [- hill]999-- hill , whilst [the streams]1000-the streams broadened and [the mountains]1001-the mountains shrank , and the vegetation changed , and [the people]1735-the people ceased being ugly and drinking beer , and began instead to drink wine and to be beautiful . And [the train]237-the train which had picked [them]998-they at sunrise out of a waste of [glaciers and hotels]1004-glaciers and hotels was waltzing at sunset round the walls of [Verona]73-verona .

" Absurd nonsense [they]998-they talk about the heat , "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip , as [they]998-they drove from [the station]1792-the station . " Supposing [we]998-they were here for pleasure , what could be more pleasurable than this ? "[172-philip]

" Did [you]172-philip hear , though , [they]998-they are remarking on the cold ? "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet nervously . " [I]102-harriet should never have thought it cold . "[102-harriet]

And on the second day the heat struck [them]998-they , like a hand laid over the mouth , just as [they]998-they were walking to see [the tomb of [Juliet]176-juliet]1006-the tomb of juliet . From that moment everything went wrong . [They]998-they fled from [Verona]73-verona . [Harriet]102-harriet 's sketch - book was stolen , and the bottle of ammonia in [her]102-harriet trunk burst over [her]102-harriet prayer - book , so that purple patches appeared on all [her]102-harriet clothes . Then , as [she]102-harriet was going through [Mantua]74-mantua at four in the morning , [Philip]172-philip made [her]102-harriet look out of the window because it was [[Virgil]177-virgil 's birthplace]1007-virgil 's birthplace , and a smut flew in [her]102-harriet eye , and [Harriet]102-harriet with a smut in [her]102-harriet eye was notorious . At [Bologna]61-bologna [they]998-they stopped twenty - four hours to rest . It was a FESTA , and [children]296-children blew bladder whistles night and day . " What a religion ! "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet . [The hotel]1775-the hotel smelt , two puppies were asleep on [her]102-harriet bed , and [her]102-harriet bedroom window looked into a belfry , which saluted [her]102-harriet slumbering form every quarter of an hour . [Philip]172-philip left [his]172-philip walking - stick , [his]172-philip socks , and the Baedeker at [Bologna]61-bologna ; [she]102-harriet only left [her]102-harriet sponge - bag . Next day [they]998-they crossed [the Apennines]75-the apennines with [a train - sick child]1010-a train - sick child and [a hot lady]1011-a hot lady , who told [them]998-they that never , never before had [she]1011-a hot lady sweated so profusely . " [Foreigners]76-foreigners are [a filthy nation]2217-a filthy nation , "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet . " [I]102-harriet do n't care if there are [tunnels]2218-tunnels ; open the windows . "[102-harriet] [He]172-philip obeyed , and [she]102-harriet got another smut in [her]102-harriet eye . Nor did [Florence]24-florence improve matters . Eating , walking , even a cross word would bathe [them]998-they both in boiling water . [Philip]172-philip , who was slighter of build , and less conscientious , suffered less . But [Harriet]102-harriet had never been to [Florence]24-florence , and between the hours of eight and eleven [she]102-harriet crawled like a wounded creature through [the streets]1012-the streets , and swooned before various masterpieces of art . It was [an irritable couple]1013-an irritable couple who took tickets to [Monteriano]7-monteriano .

" [Singles]178-singles or returns ? "[172-philip] said [he]172-philip .

" A single for [me]102-harriet , "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet peevishly ; " [I]102-harriet shall never get back alive . "[102-harriet]

" [Sweet creature]2219-sweet creature ! "[1014-her brother] said [[her]102-harriet brother]1014-her brother , suddenly breaking down . " How helpful [you]102-harriet will be when [we]2220-we come to [Signor Carella]131-signor carella ! "[1014-her brother]

" Do [you]172-philip suppose , "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet , standing still among a whirl of [porters]1015-porters - " do [you]172-philip suppose [I]102-harriet am going to enter [[that man]2221-that man 's house]2222-that man 's house ? "[102-harriet]

" Then what have [you]102-harriet come for , pray ? For ornament ? "[1014-her brother]

" To see that [you]172-philip do [your]172-philip duty . "[102-harriet]

" Oh , thanks ! "[1014-her brother]

" So [mother]1749-mother told [me]102-harriet . For goodness sake get the tickets ; here comes [that hot woman]2224-that hot woman again ! [She]2224-that hot woman has the impudence to bow . "[102-harriet]

" [Mother]115-mother told [you]102-harriet , did [she]115-mother ? "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip wrathfully , as [he]172-philip went to struggle for tickets at a slit so narrow that they were handed to [him]172-philip edgeways . [Italy]8-italy was beastly , and [[Florence]24-florence station]1016-florence station is [the centre of [beastly Italy]8-italy]1017-the centre of beastly italy . But [he]172-philip had a strange feeling that [he]172-philip was to blame for it all ; that a little influx into [him]172-philip of virtue would make [the whole land]1018-the whole land not beastly but amusing . For there was enchantment , [he]172-philip was sure of that ; solid enchantment , which lay behind [the porters]1019-the porters and the screaming and the dust . [He]172-philip could see it in the terrific blue sky beneath which [they]1020-they travelled , in the whitened plain which gripped life tighter than a frost , in [the exhausted reaches of [the Arno]79-the arno]1021-the exhausted reaches of the arno , in [the ruins of brown castles which stood quivering upon [the hills]390-the hills]1022-the ruins of brown castles which stood quivering upon the hills . [He]172-philip could see it , though [his]172-philip head ached and [his]172-philip skin was twitching , though [he]172-philip was here as a puppet , and though [[his]172-philip sister]304-his sister knew how [he]172-philip was [here]1844-here . There was nothing pleasant in that journey to [[Monteriano]7-monteriano station]1026-monteriano station . But nothing - not even the discomfort - was commonplace .

" But do [people]1776-people live inside ? "[102-harriet] asked [Harriet]102-harriet . [They]1020-they had exchanged [railway - carriage]1027-railway - carriage for the legno , and [the legno]1028-the legno had emerged from the withered trees , and had revealed to [them]1020-they [their]1020-they destination . [Philip]172-philip , to be annoying , answered " No . "[172-philip]

" What do [they]1776-people do [there]1769-there ? "[102-harriet] continued [Harriet]102-harriet , with a frown .

" There is [a caffe]2227-a caffe . [A prison]2228-a prison . [A theatre]2229-a theatre . [A church]2230-a church . Walls . A view . "[172-philip]

" Not for [me]102-harriet , thank [you]172-philip , "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet , after a weighty pause .

" [Nobody]633-nobody asked [you]172-philip , [Miss]2232-miss , [you]172-philip see . Now [Lilia]100-lilia was asked by such [a nice young gentleman]2233-a nice young gentleman , with curls all over [his]172-philip forehead , and teeth just as white as [father]1858-father makes them . "[172-philip] Then [his]172-philip manner changed . " But , [Harriet]102-harriet , do [you]102-harriet see nothing wonderful or attractive in [that place]2163-that place - nothing at all ? "[172-philip]

" Nothing at all . It 's frightful . "[172-philip]

" [I]172-philip know it is . But it 's old - awfully old . "[172-philip]

" Beauty is the only test , "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet . " At least so [you]102-harriet told [me]102-harriet when [I]102-harriet sketched [old buildings]2236-old buildings - for the sake , [I]102-harriet suppose , of making [yourself]102-harriet unpleasant . "[102-harriet]

" Oh , [I]172-philip 'm perfectly right . But at the same time - [I]172-philip do n't know - so many things have happened [here]1844-here - [people]1776-people have lived so hard and so splendidly - [I]172-philip ca n't explain . "[172-philip]

" [I]102-harriet should n't think [you]102-harriet could . It does n't seem the best moment to begin [your]102-harriet Italy mania . [I]102-harriet thought [you]102-harriet were cured of it by now . Instead , will [you]102-harriet kindly tell [me]102-harriet what [you]102-harriet are going to do when [you]102-harriet arrive . [I]102-harriet do beg [you]102-harriet will not be taken unawares this time . "[102-harriet]

" First , [Harriet]102-harriet , [I]172-philip shall settle [you]102-harriet at [the Stella d'Italia]661-the stella d'italia , in the comfort that befits [your]102-harriet sex and disposition . Then [I]172-philip shall make [myself]172-philip some tea . After tea [I]172-philip shall take a book into [Santa Deodata]162-santa deodata 's , and read there . It is always fresh and cool . "[172-philip]

[The martyred Harriet]102-harriet exclaimed , " [I]102-harriet 'm not clever , [Philip]172-philip . [I]102-harriet do n't go in for it , as [you]172-philip know . But [I]102-harriet know what 's rude . And [I]102-harriet know what 's wrong . "[102-harriet]

" Meaning - ? "[102-harriet]

" [You]172-philip ! "[102-harriet] [she]102-harriet shouted , bouncing on the cushions of the legno and startling [all the fleas]1029-all the fleas . " What 's the good of cleverness if [a man]1757-a man 's murdered [a woman]406-a woman ? "[102-harriet]

" [Harriet]102-harriet , [I]102-harriet am hot . To whom do [you]102-harriet refer ? "[102-harriet]

" [He]1757-a man . [Her]406-a woman . If [you]102-harriet do n't look out [he]1757-a man 'll murder [you]102-harriet . [I]102-harriet wish [he]1757-a man would . "[102-harriet]

" Tut tut , tutlet ! [You]102-harriet 'd find a corpse extraordinarily inconvenient . "[1030-he] Then [he]1030-he tried to be less aggravating . " [I]1030-he heartily dislike [the fellow]2242-the fellow , but [we]2243-we know [he]1757-a man did n't murder [her]406-a woman . In that letter , though [she]406-a woman said a lot , [she]406-a woman never said [he]1757-a man was physically cruel . "[1030-he]

" [He]1757-a man has murdered [her]406-a woman . The things [he]1757-a man did - things [one]289-one ca n't even mention - "[102-harriet]

" Things which [one]289-one must mention if [one]289-one 's to talk at all . And things which one must keep in [their]289-one proper place . " [I]102-harriet condemn [the whole lot]2252-the whole lot . "[102-harriet]

" Things are n't so jolly easy , "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip , more to [himself]172-philip than to [her]1032-her .

But for [Harriet]102-harriet things were easy , though not jolly , and [she]1032-her turned upon [[her]1032-her brother]1014-her brother yet again . " What about [the baby]2072-the baby , pray ? [You]2251-you 've said a lot of smart things and whittled away morality and religion and [I]1032-her do n't know what ; but what about [the baby]2072-the baby ? [You]2251-you think [me]1032-her [a fool]1928-a fool , but [I]1032-her 've been noticing [you]2251-you all today , and [you]2251-you have n't mentioned [the baby]2072-the baby once . [You]2251-you have n't thought about it , even . [You]2251-you do n't care . [Philip]172-philip ! [I]1032-her shall not speak to [you]2251-you . [You]2251-you are intolerable . "[1032-her]

[She]1032-her kept [her]1032-her promise , and never opened [her]1032-her lips all the rest of the way . But [her]1032-her eyes glowed with anger and resolution . For [she]1032-her was [a straight , brave woman]1034-a straight , brave woman , as well as [a peevish one]1035-a peevish one .

[Philip]172-philip acknowledged [her]1032-her reproof to be true . [He]172-philip did not care about [the baby]2072-the baby one straw . Nevertheless , [he]172-philip meant to do [his]172-philip duty , and [he]172-philip was fairly confident of success . If [Gino]144-gino would have sold [[his]144-gino wife]533-his wife for a thousand lire , for how much less would [he]144-gino not sell [[his]144-gino child]1038-his child ? It was just a commercial transaction . Why should it interfere with other things ? [His]172-philip eyes were fixed on [the towers]464-the towers again , just as they had been fixed when [he]172-philip drove with [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott . But this time [his]172-philip thoughts were pleasanter , for [he]172-philip had no such grave business on [his]172-philip mind . It was in the spirit of [the cultivated tourist]1040-the cultivated tourist that [he]172-philip approached [his]172-philip destination .

[One of [the towers]464-the towers]1041-one of the towers , rough as any other , was topped by a cross - [the tower of [the Collegiate Church of Santa Deodata]46-the collegiate church of santa deodata]1043-the tower of the collegiate church of santa deodata . [She]1044-her was [a holy maiden of the Dark Ages]1045-a holy maiden of the dark ages , [[the city]460-the city 's patron saint]1047-the city 's patron saint , and sweetness and barbarity mingle strangely in [her]1044-her story . So holy was [she]1044-her that all [her]1044-her life [she]1044-her lay upon [her]1044-her back in [the house of [[her]1044-her mother]270-her mother]1048-the house of her mother , refusing to eat , refusing to play , refusing to work . [The devil]2126-the devil , envious of such sanctity , tempted [her]1044-her in various ways . [He]172-philip dangled grapes above [her]1044-her , [he]172-philip showed [her]1044-her fascinating toys , [he]172-philip pushed soft pillows beneath [her]1044-her aching head . When all proved vain [he]172-philip tripped up [the mother]1051-the mother and flung [her]1051-the mother downstairs before [her]1044-her very eyes . But so holy was [the saint]1052-the saint that [she]1052-the saint never picked [[her]1052-the saint mother]270-her mother up , but lay upon [her]270-her mother back through all , and thus assured [her]1052-the saint throne in [Paradise]80-paradise . [She]1052-the saint was only fifteen when [she]1052-the saint died , which shows how much is within the reach of [any school - girl]1054-any school - girl . Those who think [her]1052-the saint life was unpractical need only think of the victories upon [Poggibonsi]41-poggibonsi , [San Gemignano]6-san gemignano , [Volterra]82-volterra , [Siena]31-siena [itself]31-siena - all gained through the invocation of [her]1052-the saint name ; [they]1055-they need only look at [the church which rose over [her]1052-the saint grave]1056-the church which rose over her grave . The grand schemes for [a marble facade]1057-a marble facade were never carried out , and it is brown unfinished stone until this day . But for the inside [Giotto]179-giotto was summoned to decorate the walls of [the nave]1058-the nave . [Giotto]179-giotto came - that is to say , [he]179-giotto did not come , German research having decisively proved - but at all events [the nave]1058-the nave is covered with frescoes , and so are [two chapels in the left transept]1060-two chapels in the left transept , and the arch into [the choir]1061-the choir , and there are scraps in [the choir]1061-the choir itself . There the decoration stopped , till in the full spring of the Renaissance [a great painter]1063-a great painter came to pay a few weeks ' visit to [[his]1063-a great painter friend]695-his friend [the Lord of [Monteriano]7-monteriano]1065-the lord of monteriano . In the intervals between the banquets and the discussions on Latin etymology and the dancing , [he]1063-a great painter would stroll over to [the church]282-the church , and there in [the fifth chapel to the right]1067-the fifth chapel to the right [he]1063-a great painter has painted two frescoes of the death and burial of [Santa Deodata]162-santa deodata . That is why [Baedeker]126-baedeker gives [the place]280-the place a star .

[Santa Deodata]162-santa deodata was better company than [Harriet]102-harriet , and [she]102-harriet kept [Philip]172-philip in a pleasant dream until [the legno]1028-the legno drew up at [the hotel]1775-the hotel . [Every one there]1071-every one there was asleep , for it was still the hour when only [idiots]1072-idiots were moving . There were not even any [beggars about]1073-beggars about . " [We]1083-you shall probably be arrested for brawling , [Harriet]102-harriet . Have [you]1083-you the very slightest sense of the ludicrous ? "[102-harriet]

[Harriet]102-harriet had not ; that was why [she]102-harriet could be so powerful . [She]102-harriet had concocted this scene in [the carriage]244-the carriage , and nothing should baulk [her]102-harriet of it . To the abuse in front and the coaxing behind [she]102-harriet was equally indifferent . How long [she]102-harriet would have stood like [a glorified Horatius]1085-a glorified horatius , keeping the staircase at both ends , was never to be known . For [the young lady , whose sleep they were disturbing]1086-the young lady , whose sleep they were disturbing , awoke and opened [her]1086-the young lady , whose sleep they were disturbing bedroom door , and came out on to [the landing]1087-the landing . [She]1086-the young lady , whose sleep they were disturbing was [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott .

[Philip]172-philip 's first coherent feeling was one of indignation . To be run by [[his]172-philip mother]307-his mother and hectored by [[his]172-philip sister]304-his sister was as much as [he]172-philip could stand . The intervention of [a third female]1090-a third female drove [him]172-philip suddenly beyond politeness . [He]172-philip was about to say exactly what [he]172-philip thought about the thing from beginning to end . But before [he]172-philip could do so [Harriet]102-harriet also had seen [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott . [She]102-harriet uttered a shrill cry of joy .

" [You]172-philip , [Caroline]107-miss abbott , here of [all people]2270-all people ! "[102-harriet] And in spite of the heat [she]102-harriet darted up [the stairs]1091-the stairs and imprinted an affectionate kiss upon [[her]102-harriet friend]1092-her friend .

[Philip]172-philip had an inspiration . " [You]172-philip will have a lot to tell [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott , [Harriet]102-harriet , and [she]102-harriet may have as much to tell [you]107-miss abbott . " Tear [each other]487-each other 's eyes out ! "[172-philip] [he]172-philip cried , gesticulating at the facade of [the hotel]1775-the hotel . " Give it to [her]102-harriet , [Harriet]102-harriet ! [Such people]1096-such people as observed [him]172-philip were interested , but did not conclude that [he]172-philip was mad . This aftermath of conversation is not unknown in [Italy]8-italy .

[He]172-philip tried to think how amusing it was ; but it would not do - [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott 's presence affected [him]172-philip too personally . Either [she]107-miss abbott suspected [him]172-philip of dishonesty , or else [she]107-miss abbott was being dishonest [herself]107-miss abbott . [He]172-philip preferred to suppose the latter . Perhaps [she]107-miss abbott had seen [Gino]144-gino , and [they]1097-they had prepared some elaborate mortification for [the Herritons]147-the herritons . Perhaps [Gino]144-gino had sold [the baby]2072-the baby cheap to [her]107-miss abbott for a joke : it was just the kind of joke that would appeal to [him]172-philip . [Philip]172-philip still remembered the laughter that had greeted [his]172-philip fruitless journey , and the uncouth push that had toppled [him]172-philip on to the bed . And whatever it might mean , [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott 's presence spoilt the comedy : [she]107-miss abbott would do nothing funny .

During this short meditation [he]172-philip had walked through [the city]460-the city , and was out on the other side . " Where does [Signor Carella]131-signor carella live ? "[172-philip] [he]172-philip asked [the men at [the Dogana]83-the dogana]1100-the men at the dogana .

" What do [you]172-philip mean ? Please , please [Mr. Herriton]136-mr. herriton , do n't be mysterious : there is n't the time . " Pray let [us]2282-we start clear , "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip , pacing up and down [the room]306-the room . " Permit [me]172-philip to begin by asking [you]172-philip a question . " [Spy]2283-spy ! "[1143-she] [she]1143-she answered , without a moment 's hesitation . [She]1143-she was standing by the little Gothic window as [she]1143-she spoke - [the hotel]1775-the hotel had been [a palace]1145-a palace once - and with [her]1143-she finger [she]1143-she was following the curves of the moulding as if they might feel beautiful and strange . " [Spy]2283-spy , "[1143-she] [she]1143-she repeated , for [Philip]172-philip was bewildered at learning [her]1143-she guilt so easily , and could not answer a word . " Oh , that 'll be all right , "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip , smiling at [[his]172-philip timorous , scrupulous women]1192-his timorous , scrupulous women - kind . " [We]2336-we 'll go as [we]2336-we are , and buy the best [we]2336-we can get . [Monteriano]7-monteriano is not formal . "[172-philip]

So this strenuous day of resolutions , plans , alarms , battles , victories , defeats , truces , ended at the opera . [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott and [Harriet]102-harriet were both a little shame - faced . [They]1193-they thought of [[their]1193-they friends]1194-their friends at [Sawston]23-sawston , who were supposing [them]1193-they to be now tilting against the powers of evil . What would [Mrs. Herriton]104-mrs. herriton , or [Irma]103-irma , or [the curates at [the Back Kitchen]300-the back kitchen]1195-the curates at the back kitchen say if [they]1197-they could see [the rescue party at [a place of amusement]1199-a place of amusement on the very first day of its mission]1198-the rescue party at a place of amusement on the very first day of its mission ? [Philip]172-philip , too , marvelled at [his]172-philip wish to go . [He]172-philip began to see that [he]172-philip was enjoying [his]172-philip time in [Monteriano]7-monteriano , in spite of the tiresomeness of [[his]172-philip companions]1200-his companions and the occasional contrariness of [himself]172-philip .

[He]172-philip had been to [this theatre]1201-this theatre many years before , on the occasion of a performance of " La Zia di [Carlo]192-carlo . "[172-philip] Since then it had been thoroughly done up , in the tints of the beet - root and the tomato , and was in many other ways a credit to [the little town]1202-the little town . The orchestra had been enlarged , some of the boxes had terra - cotta draperies , and over each box was now suspended an enormous tablet , neatly framed , bearing upon it the number of that box . There was also a drop - scene , representing a pink and purple landscape , wherein sported many [a lady lightly clad]1203-a lady lightly clad , and [two more ladies]1204-two more ladies lay along the top of the proscenium to steady a large and pallid clock . So rich and so appalling was the effect , that [Philip]172-philip could scarcely suppress a cry . There is something majestic in the bad taste of [Italy]8-italy ; it is not the bad taste of [a country]2079-a country which knows no better ; it has not the nervous vulgarity of [England]20-england , or the blinded vulgarity of [Germany]88-germany . It observes beauty , and chooses to pass it by . But it attains to beauty 's confidence . [This tiny theatre of [Monteriano]7-monteriano]1206-this tiny theatre of monteriano spraddled and swaggered with the best of [them]1206-this tiny theatre of monteriano , and [these ladies]1207-these ladies with [their]1207-these ladies clock would have nodded to [the young men on the ceiling of the Sistine]1208-the young men on the ceiling of the sistine .

[Philip]172-philip had tried for a box , but all the best were taken : it was rather a grand performance , and [he]172-philip had to be content with stalls . [Harriet]102-harriet was fretful and insular . [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott was pleasant , and insisted on praising everything : [her]107-miss abbott only regret was that [she]107-miss abbott had no pretty clothes with [her]107-miss abbott .

" [We]2354-we do all right , "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip , amused at [her]107-miss abbott unwonted vanity .

" Yes , [I]172-philip know ; but pretty things pack as easily as ugly ones . [We]2354-we had no need to come to [Italy]8-italy like [guys]2355-guys . "[172-philip]

This time [he]172-philip did not reply , " But [we]2354-we 're here to rescue [a baby]2063-a baby . "[172-philip] For [he]172-philip saw a charming picture , as charming a picture as [he]172-philip had seen for years - [the hot red theatre]1209-the hot red theatre ; outside [the theatre]629-the theatre , towers and dark gates and mediaeval walls ; beyond the walls olive - trees in the starlight and white winding roads and fireflies and untroubled dust ; and here in the middle of it all , [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott , wishing [she]107-miss abbott had not come looking like [a guy]1211-a guy . [She]107-miss abbott had made the right remark . Most undoubtedly [she]107-miss abbott had made the right remark . [This stiff suburban woman]1212-this stiff suburban woman was unbending before the shrine .

" Do n't [you]1212-this stiff suburban woman like it at all ? "[172-philip] [he]172-philip asked [her]1212-this stiff suburban woman .

" Most awfully . "[1213-they] And by this bald interchange [they]1213-they convinced [each other]487-each other that Romance was here .

[Harriet]102-harriet , meanwhile , had been coughing ominously at the drop - scene , which presently rose on [the grounds of [Ravenswood]89-ravenswood]1215-the grounds of ravenswood , and [the chorus of Scotch retainers]1216-the chorus of scotch retainers burst into cry . [The audience]2328-the audience accompanied with tappings and drummings , swaying in the melody like corn in the wind . [Harriet]102-harriet , though [she]102-harriet did not care for music , knew how to listen to it . [She]102-harriet uttered an acid " Shish ! "[102-harriet]

" Shut it , "[1014-her brother] whispered [[her]102-harriet brother]1014-her brother .

" [We]1213-they must make a stand from the beginning . [They]1735-the people 're talking . "[102-harriet]

" It is tiresome , "[107-miss abbott] murmured [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott ; " but perhaps it is n't for [us]1213-they to interfere . "[107-miss abbott]

[Harriet]102-harriet shook [her]102-harriet head and shished again . [The people]1735-the people were quiet , not because it is wrong to talk during a chorus , but because it is natural to be civil to [a visitor]546-a visitor . For a little time [she]102-harriet kept [the whole house]1221-the whole house in order , and could smile at [[her]102-harriet brother]1014-her brother complacently .

[Her]102-harriet success annoyed [him]1014-her brother . [He]1014-her brother had grasped the principle of opera in [Italy]8-italy - it aims not at illusion but at entertainment - and [he]1014-her brother did not want this great evening - party to turn into a prayer - meeting . But soon the boxes began to fill , and [Harriet]102-harriet 's power was over . [Families]1899-families greeted [each other]487-each other across [the auditorium]1225-the auditorium . [People in [the pit]1227-the pit]1226-people in the pit hailed [[their]1226-people in the pit brothers]1228-their brothers and [sons]1229-sons in the chorus , and told [them]1226-people in the pit how well [they]1226-people in the pit were singing . When [Lucia]189-lucia appeared by the fountain there was loud applause , and cries of " Welcome to [Monteriano]7-monteriano ! "[189-lucia]

" [Ridiculous babies]2357-ridiculous babies ! "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet , settling down in [her]102-harriet stall .

" Why , it is [the famous hot lady of [the Apennines]75-the apennines]2358-the famous hot lady of the apennines , "[172-philip] cried [Philip]172-philip ; " the one who had never , never before - "[172-philip]

" Ugh ! Do n't . [She]189-lucia will be very vulgar . And [I]189-lucia 'm sure it 's even worse here than in [the tunnel]2359-the tunnel . [I]189-lucia wish [we]2360-we 'd never - "[189-lucia]

[Lucia]189-lucia began to sing , and there was a moment 's silence . [She]189-lucia was stout and ugly ; but [her]189-lucia voice was still beautiful , and as [she]189-lucia sang [the theatre]629-the theatre murmured like a hive of happy bees . All through the coloratura [she]189-lucia was accompanied by sighs , and its top note was drowned in a shout of universal joy .

So the opera proceeded . [The singers]1231-the singers drew inspiration from [the audience]2328-the audience , and [the two great sextettes]1233-the two great sextettes were rendered not unworthily . [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott fell into the spirit of the thing . [She]107-miss abbott , too , chatted and laughed and applauded and encored , and rejoiced in the existence of beauty . As for [Philip]172-philip , [he]172-philip forgot [himself]172-philip as well as [his]172-philip mission . [He]172-philip was not even [an enthusiastic visitor]1234-an enthusiastic visitor . For [he]172-philip had been in [this place]1787-this place always . It was [[his]172-philip home]631-his home .

[Harriet]102-harriet , like [M. Bovary]193-m. bovary on a more famous occasion , was trying to follow the plot . Occasionally [she]102-harriet nudged [[her]102-harriet companions]1237-her companions , and asked [them]1237-her companions what had become of [Walter Scott]191-sir walter scott . [She]102-harriet looked round grimly . [The audience]2328-the audience sounded drunk , and even [Caroline]107-miss abbott , who never took a drop , was swaying oddly . Violent waves of excitement , all arising from very little , went sweeping round [the theatre]629-the theatre . The climax was reached in the mad scene . [Lucia]189-lucia , clad in white , as befitted [her]189-lucia malady , suddenly gathered up [her]189-lucia streaming hair and bowed [her]189-lucia acknowledgment to [the audience]2328-the audience . Then from the back of [the stage]1241-the stage - [she]189-lucia feigned not to see it - there advanced a kind of bamboo clothes - horse , stuck all over with bouquets . It was very ugly , and most of the flowers in it were false . [Lucia]189-lucia knew this , and so did [the audience]2328-the audience ; and [they]2328-the audience all knew that the clothes - horse was a piece of stage property , brought in to make the performance go year after year . [None the less]1243-none the less did it unloose [the great deeps]1244-the great deeps . With a scream of amazement and joy [she]189-lucia embraced the animal , pulled out one or two practicable blossoms , pressed them to [her]189-lucia lips , and flung them into [[her]189-lucia admirers]1245-her admirers . [They]1245-her admirers flung [them]1245-her admirers back , with loud melodious cries , and [a little boy in one of the stageboxes]1246-a little boy in one of the stageboxes snatched up [[his]1246-a little boy in one of the stageboxes sister]304-his sister 's carnations and offered them . " Che carino ! "[1248-the singer] exclaimed [the singer]1248-the singer . [She]189-lucia darted at [the little boy]1249-the little boy and kissed [him]1249-the little boy . Now the noise became tremendous . " Silence ! silence ! "[1250-many old gentlemen] shouted [many old gentlemen]1250-many old gentlemen behind . " Let [the divine creature]2361-the divine creature continue ! "[1250-many old gentlemen] But [the young men in the adjacent box]1251-the young men in the adjacent box were imploring [Lucia]189-lucia to extend [her]189-lucia civility to [them]1251-the young men in the adjacent box . [She]189-lucia refused , with a humorous , expressive gesture . [One of [them]1251-the young men in the adjacent box]1252-one of them hurled a bouquet at [her]189-lucia . [She]189-lucia spurned it with [her]189-lucia foot . Then , encouraged by the roars of [the audience]2328-the audience , [she]189-lucia picked it up and tossed it to [them]1251-the young men in the adjacent box . [Harriet]102-harriet was always unfortunate . The bouquet struck [her]102-harriet full in the chest , and a little billet - doux fell out of it into [her]102-harriet lap .

" Call this classical ! "[102-harriet] [she]102-harriet cried , rising from [her]102-harriet seat . " It 's not even respectable ! [Philip]172-philip ! take [me]102-harriet out at once . "[102-harriet]

" Whose is it ? "[1014-her brother] shouted [[her]102-harriet brother]1014-her brother , holding up the bouquet in one hand and the billet - doux in the other . " Whose is it ? "[1014-her brother]

[The house]251-the house exploded , and one of the boxes was violently agitated , as if some one was being hauled to the front . [Harriet]102-harriet moved down [the gangway]1256-the gangway , and compelled [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott to follow [her]102-harriet . [Philip]172-philip , still laughing and calling " Whose is it ? "[172-philip] brought up the rear . [He]172-philip was drunk with excitement . The heat , the fatigue , and the enjoyment had mounted into [his]172-philip head .

" To the left ! "[1735-the people] [the people]1735-the people cried . " [The innamorato]2362-the innamorato is to the left . "[1735-the people]

[He]172-philip deserted [[his]172-philip ladies]1258-his ladies and plunged towards the box . [A young man]1259-a young man was flung stomach downwards across the balustrade . [Philip]172-philip handed [him]1259-a young man up the bouquet and the note . Then [his]1259-a young man own hands were seized affectionately . It all seemed quite natural .

" Why have [you]172-philip not written ? "[1260-the young man] cried [the young man]1260-the young man . " Why do [you]172-philip take [me]1260-the young man by surprise ? "[1260-the young man]

" Oh , [I]172-philip 've written , "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip hilariously . " [I]172-philip left a note this afternoon . "[172-philip]

" Silence ! silence ! "[1261-the audience , who were beginning to have enough] cried [the audience , who were beginning to have enough]1261-the audience , who were beginning to have enough . " Let [the divine creature]2361-the divine creature continue . "[1261-the audience , who were beginning to have enough] [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott and [Harriet]102-harriet had disappeared .

" No ! no ! "[1260-the young man] cried [the young man]1260-the young man . " [You]172-philip do n't escape [me]1260-the young man now . "[1260-the young man] For [Philip]172-philip was trying feebly to disengage [his]172-philip hands . [Amiable youths]1263-amiable youths bent out of the box and invited [him]172-philip to enter it .

" [[Gino]144-gino 's friends]2364-gino 's friends are [ours]2364-gino 's friends - "[2328-the audience]

" [I]2328-the audience left a message . "[2328-the audience]

" Thank [you]2328-the audience - [ladies]1912-ladies - there is not time - "[172-philip]

The next moment [he]172-philip was swinging by [his]172-philip arms . The moment after [he]172-philip shot over the balustrade into the box . Then [the conductor]1265-the conductor , seeing that the incident was over , raised [his]1265-the conductor baton . [The house]251-the house was hushed , and [Lucia di Lammermoor]189-lucia resumed [her]189-lucia song of madness and death .

[Philip]172-philip had whispered introductions to [the pleasant people who had pulled [him]172-philip in]1267-the pleasant people who had pulled him in - [[tradesmen]1268-tradesmen 's sons]1269-tradesmen 's sons perhaps [they]1269-tradesmen 's sons were , or [medical students]1270-medical students , or [solicitors ' clerks]1271-solicitors ' clerks , or [sons of other dentists]1272-sons of other dentists . There is no knowing who is who in [Italy]8-italy . [The guest of the evening]1273-the guest of the evening was [a private soldier]1274-a private soldier . [He]1274-a private soldier shared the honour now with [Philip]172-philip . [The two]1275-the two had to stand side by side in the front , and exchange compliments , whilst [Gino]144-gino presided , courteous , but delightfully familiar . [Philip]172-philip would have a spasm of horror at the muddle [he]172-philip had made . But the spasm would pass , and again [he]172-philip would be enchanted by the kind , cheerful voices , the laughter that was never vapid , and the light caress of the arm across [his]172-philip back .

[He]172-philip could not get away till the play was nearly finished , and [Edgardo]194-edgardo was singing amongst the tombs of [ancestors]830-ancestors . [[His]172-philip new friends]1277-his new friends hoped to see [him]172-philip at [the Garibaldi]141-caffe garibaldi tomorrow evening . [He]172-philip promised ; then [he]172-philip remembered that if [they]1277-his new friends kept to [Harriet]102-harriet 's plan [he]172-philip would have left [Monteriano]7-monteriano . " At ten o'clock , then , "[172-philip] [he]172-philip said to [Gino]144-gino . " [I]172-philip want to speak to [you]144-gino alone . At ten . "[172-philip]

" Certainly ! "[470-the other] laughed [the other]470-the other .

[Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott was sitting up for [him]172-philip when [he]172-philip got back . [Harriet]102-harriet , it seemed , had gone straight to bed .

" That was [he]172-philip , was n't it ? "[102-harriet] [she]102-harriet asked .

" Yes , rather . "[172-philip]

" [I]172-philip suppose [you]172-philip did n't settle anything ? "[172-philip]

" Why , no ; how could [I]172-philip ? The fact is - well , [I]172-philip got taken by surprise , but after all , what does it matter ? There 's no earthly reason why [we]2369-we should n't do the business pleasantly . [He]172-philip 's [a perfectly charming person]2370-a perfectly charming person , and so are [[his]172-philip friends]2371-his friends . [I]172-philip 'm [[his]172-philip friend]695-his friend now - [[his]172-philip long - lost brother]2373-his long - lost brother . What 's the harm ? [I]172-philip tell [you]172-philip , [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott , it 's one thing for [England]20-england and another for [Italy]8-italy . There [we]2369-we plan and get on high moral horses . Here [we]2369-we find what asses [we]2369-we are , for things go off quite easily , all by [themselves]2371-his friends . [My]172-philip hat , what a night ! Did [you]172-philip ever see a really purple sky and really silver stars before ? Well , as [I]172-philip was saying , it 's absurd to worry ; [he]172-philip 's not [a porky father]2374-a porky father . [He]172-philip wants [that baby]2375-that baby as little as [I]172-philip do . [He]172-philip 's been ragging [[my]172-philip dear mother]2376-my dear mother - just as [he]172-philip ragged [me]172-philip eighteen months ago , and [I]172-philip 've forgiven [him]172-philip . Oh , but [he]172-philip has a sense of humour ! "[172-philip]

[Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott , too , had a wonderful evening , nor did [she]107-miss abbott ever remember such stars or such a sky . [Her]107-miss abbott head , too , was full of music , and that night when [she]107-miss abbott opened the window [[her]107-miss abbott room]1279-her room was filled with warm , sweet air . [She]107-miss abbott was bathed in beauty within and without ; [she]107-miss abbott could not go to bed for happiness . Had [she]107-miss abbott ever been so happy before ? Yes , once before , and here , a night in [March]67-march , the night [Gino]144-gino and [Lilia]100-lilia had told [her]107-miss abbott of [their]1280-their love - the night whose evil [she]107-miss abbott had come now to undo .

[She]107-miss abbott gave a sudden cry of shame . " This time - [the same place]2377-the same place - the same thing "[107-miss abbott] - and [she]107-miss abbott began to beat down [her]107-miss abbott happiness , knowing it to be sinful . [She]107-miss abbott was here to fight against [this place]1787-this place , to rescue [a little soul - who was innocent as yet]1282-a little soul - who was innocent as yet . [She]107-miss abbott was here to champion morality and purity , and the holy life of [an English home]1283-an english home . In the spring [she]107-miss abbott had sinned through ignorance ; [she]107-miss abbott was not ignorant now . " Help [me]107-miss abbott ! "[107-miss abbott] [she]107-miss abbott cried , and shut the window as if there was magic in the encircling air . But the tunes would not go out of [her]107-miss abbott head , and all night long [she]107-miss abbott was troubled by torrents of music , and by applause and laughter , and [angry young men who shouted the distich out of [Baedeker]126-baedeker]1284-angry young men who shouted the distich out of baedeker : -

Poggibonizzi fatti in la , Che Monteriano si fa citta !

[Poggibonsi]41-poggibonsi was revealed to [her]107-miss abbott as [they]1284-angry young men who shouted the distich out of baedeker sang - [a joyless , straggling place]1285-a joyless , straggling place , full of [people who pretended]1286-people who pretended . When [she]107-miss abbott woke up [she]107-miss abbott knew that it had been [Sawston]23-sawston .

Chapter 7

At about nine o'clock next morning [Perfetta]150-perfetta went out on to [the loggia]607-the loggia , not to look at the view , but to throw some dirty water at it . " Scusi tanto ! "[150-perfetta] [she]150-perfetta wailed , for the water spattered [a tall young lady who had for some time been tapping at the lower door]1288-a tall young lady who had for some time been tapping at the lower door .

" Is [Signor Carella]131-signor carella in ? "[1289-the young lady] [the young lady]1289-the young lady asked . It was no business of [Perfetta]150-perfetta 's to be shocked , and the style of [the visitor]549-the visitor seemed to demand [the reception - room]1291-the reception - room . Accordingly [she]150-perfetta opened [its]1291-the reception - room shutters , dusted a round patch on one of the horsehair chairs , and bade [the lady]1752-the lady do [herself]1752-the lady the inconvenience of sitting down . Then [she]150-perfetta ran into [Monteriano]7-monteriano and shouted up and down [[its]7-monteriano streets]1293-its streets until such time as [[her]150-perfetta young master]1294-her young master should hear [her]150-perfetta .

[The reception - room]1291-the reception - room was sacred to [the dead wife]1296-the dead wife . [Her]1296-the dead wife shiny portrait hung upon the wall - similar , doubtless , in all respects to the one which would be pasted on [her]1296-the dead wife tombstone . A little piece of black drapery had been tacked above the frame to lend a dignity to woe . But two of the tacks had fallen out , and the effect was now rakish , as of [a drunkard]1297-a drunkard 's bonnet . A coon song lay open on the piano , and of the two tables one supported [Baedeker]126-baedeker 's " Central [Italy]8-italy , "[102-harriet] the other [Harriet]102-harriet 's inlaid box . And over everything there lay a deposit of heavy white dust , which was only blown off one moment to thicken on another . It is well to be remembered with love . It is not so very dreadful to be forgotten entirely . But if [we]1298-we shall resent anything on [earth]2111-earth at all , [we]1298-we shall resent the consecration of [a deserted room]1300-a deserted room .

[Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott did not sit down , partly because [the antimacassars]1301-the antimacassars might harbour fleas , partly because [she]107-miss abbott had suddenly felt faint , and was glad to cling on to the funnel of the stove . [She]150-perfetta struggled with [herself]150-perfetta , for [she]150-perfetta had need to be very calm ; only if [she]150-perfetta was very calm might [her]150-perfetta behaviour be justified . [She]150-perfetta had broken faith with [Philip]172-philip and [Harriet]102-harriet : [she]150-perfetta was going to try for [the baby]2072-the baby before [they]1303-them did . If [she]150-perfetta failed [she]150-perfetta could scarcely look [them]1303-them in the face again .

" [Harriet]102-harriet and [[her]102-harriet brother]1014-her brother , "[150-perfetta] [she]150-perfetta reasoned , " do n't realize what is before [them]1303-them . [She]102-harriet would bluster and be rude ; [he]172-philip would be pleasant and take it as a joke . [Both of [them]1303-them]2379-both of them - even if [they]1303-them offered money - would fail . But [I]150-perfetta begin to understand [the man]370-the man 's nature ; [he]370-the man does not love [the child]250-the child , but [he]370-the man will be touchy about it - and that is quite as bad for [us]1303-them . [He]370-the man 's charming , but [he]370-the man 's [no fool]2382-no fool ; [he]370-the man conquered [me]150-perfetta last year ; [he]370-the man conquered [Mr. Herriton]136-mr. herriton yesterday , and if [I]150-perfetta am not careful [he]370-the man will conquer [us]1303-them all today , and [the baby]2072-the baby will grow up in [Monteriano]7-monteriano . [He]370-the man is terribly strong ; [Lilia]100-lilia found that out , but only [I]150-perfetta remember it now . "[150-perfetta]

This attempt , and this justification of it , were the results of the long and restless night . [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott had come to believe that [she]107-miss abbott alone could do battle with [Gino]144-gino , because [she]107-miss abbott alone understood [him]144-gino ; and [she]107-miss abbott had put this , as nicely as [she]107-miss abbott could , in a note which [she]107-miss abbott had left for [Philip]172-philip . It distressed [her]107-miss abbott to write such a note , partly because [her]107-miss abbott education inclined [her]107-miss abbott to reverence [the male]1304-the male , partly because [she]107-miss abbott had got to like [Philip]172-philip a good deal after [their]1305-their last strange interview . [His]172-philip pettiness would be dispersed , and as for [his]172-philip " unconventionality , "[172-philip] which was so much gossiped about at [Sawston]23-sawston , [she]107-miss abbott began to see that it did not differ greatly from certain familiar notions of [her]107-miss abbott own . If only [he]172-philip would forgive [her]107-miss abbott for what [she]107-miss abbott was doing now , there might perhaps be before [them]1305-their a long and profitable friendship . But [she]107-miss abbott must succeed . [No one]1773-no one would forgive [her]107-miss abbott if [she]107-miss abbott did not succeed . [She]107-miss abbott prepared to do battle with the powers of evil .

The voice of [[her]107-miss abbott adversary]1307-her adversary was heard at last , singing fearlessly from [his]172-philip expanded lungs , like [a professional]1308-a professional . Herein [he]172-philip differed from [Englishmen , who always have a little feeling against music , and sing only from the throat , apologetically]1309-englishmen , who always have a little feeling against music , and sing only from the throat , apologetically . [He]172-philip padded [upstairs]379-upstairs , and looked in at the open door of [the reception - room]1291-the reception - room without seeing [her]107-miss abbott . [Her]107-miss abbott heart leapt and [her]107-miss abbott throat was dry when [he]172-philip turned away and passed , still singing , into [the room opposite]1312-the room opposite . It is alarming not to be seen .

[He]172-philip had left the door of [this room]1313-this room open , and [she]107-miss abbott could see into [it]1313-this room , right across [the landing]1087-the landing . [It]1313-this room was in a shocking mess . Food , bedclothes , patent - leather boots , dirty plates , and knives lay strewn over a large table and on the floor . But it was the mess that comes of life , not of desolation . It was preferable to [the charnel - chamber in which [she]107-miss abbott was standing now]1315-the charnel - chamber in which she was standing now , and the light in [it]1315-the charnel - chamber in which she was standing now was soft and large , as from some gracious , noble opening .

[He]172-philip stopped singing , and cried " Where is [Perfetta]150-perfetta ? "[172-philip]

[His]172-philip back was turned , and [he]172-philip was lighting a cigar . [He]172-philip was not speaking to [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott . [He]172-philip could not even be expecting [her]107-miss abbott . [She]107-miss abbott could no more call out to [him]172-philip than if [he]172-philip was [Hamlet]195-hamlet .

" [You]107-miss abbott know ! "[172-philip] [he]172-philip continued , " but [you]107-miss abbott will not tell [me]172-philip . Exactly like [you]107-miss abbott . "[172-philip] [He]172-philip reclined on the table and blew a fat smoke - ring . " And why wo n't [you]107-miss abbott tell [me]172-philip the numbers ? [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott did not know of [the Tombola]92-the tombola . [His]172-philip speech terrified [her]107-miss abbott . [She]107-miss abbott felt those subtle restrictions which come upon [us]1318-us in fatigue . [He]172-philip had got into [another world]2153-another world .

" Two hundred and five - eighty - two . In any case [I]107-miss abbott shall put them on [Bari]93-bari , not on [Florence]24-florence . There [he]1322-he was , wanting to know what had frightened [her]107-miss abbott , how [she]107-miss abbott had got [here]1844-here , why [she]107-miss abbott had never spoken . [He]1322-he made [her]107-miss abbott sit down . [He]1322-he brought [her]107-miss abbott wine , which [she]107-miss abbott refused . [She]107-miss abbott had not one word to say to [him]1322-he .

[He]1322-he , too , was frightened , and perspiration came starting through the tan . For it is a serious thing to have been watched . [We]1324-we all radiate something curiously intimate when [we]1324-we believe [ourselves]1324-we to be alone .

" Business - "[107-miss abbott] [she]107-miss abbott said at last .

"[1322-he] And taking [her]107-miss abbott into [the room where [he]1322-he lived]1326-the room where he lived , [he]1322-he pointed to - [the baby]2072-the baby .

[She]107-miss abbott had thought so much about [this baby]2067-this baby , of [its]2067-this baby welfare , [its]2067-this baby soul , its morals , [its]2067-this baby probable defects . The real thing , lying asleep on a dirty rug , disconcerted [her]107-miss abbott . It did not stand for a principle any longer . It was so much flesh and blood , so many inches and ounces of life - a glorious , unquestionable fact , which [a man]1757-a man and [another woman]1332-another woman had given to [the world]1768-the world . [You]1334-you could talk to it ; in time it would answer [you]1334-you ; in time it would not answer [you]1334-you unless it chose , but would secrete , within the compass of its body , thoughts and wonderful passions of its own . And this was the machine on which [she]107-miss abbott and [Mrs. Herriton]104-mrs. herriton and [Philip]172-philip and [Harriet]102-harriet had for the last month been exercising [their]1335-their various ideals - had determined that in time it should move this way or that way , should accomplish this and not that . But [she]107-miss abbott had practised self - discipline , and [her]107-miss abbott thoughts and actions were not yet to correspond . " [He]2424-your relative has [a grandmother]2425-a grandmother there , [you]144-gino know - [Mrs. Theobald]105-mrs. theobald . "[144-gino]

" [He]2424-your relative has [a grandmother]2425-a grandmother [here]1844-here . No , [he]2424-your relative is troublesome , but [I]144-gino must have [him]2424-your relative with [me]144-gino . " How ? "[144-gino]

" [They]2430-they would separate [our]2431-us thoughts . "[1360-her]

[She]1360-her was silent . [This cruel , vicious fellow]1361-this cruel , vicious fellow knew of strange refinements . It was [her]1360-her duty to rescue [the baby]2072-the baby , to save [it]2072-the baby from contagion , and [she]1360-her still meant to do [her]1360-her duty . But the comfortable sense of virtue left [her]1360-her . [She]1360-her was in the presence of something greater than right or wrong .

Forgetting that this was an interview , [he]144-gino had strolled back into [the room]306-the room , driven by the instinct [she]1360-her had aroused in [him]144-gino . " Wake up ! "[144-gino] [he]144-gino cried to [[his]144-gino baby]1365-his baby , as if it was [some grown - up friend]1366-some grown - up friend . Then [he]144-gino lifted [his]144-gino foot and trod lightly on its stomach .

[Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott cried , " Oh , take care ! "[107-miss abbott] [She]107-miss abbott was unaccustomed to this method of awakening [the young]313-the young .

" [He]144-gino is not much longer than [my]107-miss abbott boot , is [he]144-gino ? Can [you]107-miss abbott believe that in time [his]144-gino own boots will be as large ? And that [he]144-gino also - "[107-miss abbott]

" But ought [you]107-miss abbott to treat [him]144-gino like that ? "[107-miss abbott]

[He]144-gino stood with one foot resting on the little body , suddenly musing , filled with the desire that [[his]144-gino son]1368-his son should be like [him]144-gino , and should have [[sons]1229-sons like [him]144-gino]1370-sons like him , to people [the earth]741-the earth . It is the strongest desire that can come to [a man]1757-a man - if it comes to [him]1757-a man at all - stronger even than love or the desire for personal immortality . [All men]1373-all men vaunt it , and declare that it is [theirs]1373-all men ; but the hearts of most are set elsewhere . It is [the exception who comprehends that physical and spiritual life]1374-the exception who comprehends that physical and spiritual life may stream out of [him]1757-a man for ever . [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott , for all [her]107-miss abbott goodness , could not comprehend it , though such a thing is more within the comprehension of [women]490-women . And when [Gino]144-gino pointed first to [himself]144-gino and then to [[his]144-gino baby]1365-his baby and said " [father - son]2432-father - son , "[144-gino] [she]107-miss abbott still took it as a piece of nursery prattle , and smiled mechanically .

[The child]250-the child , the first fruits , woke up and glared at [her]107-miss abbott . [Gino]144-gino did not greet it , but continued the exposition of [his]144-gino policy .

" [This woman]2409-this woman will do exactly what [I]144-gino tell [her]2409-this woman . [She]2409-this woman is fond of [children]296-children . [The baby]2072-the baby gave a piercing yell .

" It is nothing . If [he]2072-the baby cries silently then [you]107-miss abbott may be frightened . [He]2072-the baby thinks [I]144-gino am going to wash [him]2072-the baby , and [he]2072-the baby is quite right . "[144-gino]

" Wash [him]2072-the baby ! "[107-miss abbott] [she]107-miss abbott cried . " [You]144-gino ? Here ? "[107-miss abbott] The homely piece of news seemed to shatter all [her]107-miss abbott plans . [He]1380-her enemy walked sternly to [the loggia]607-the loggia and drew from it a large earthenware bowl . It was dirty inside ; [he]1380-her enemy dusted it with a tablecloth . " Who would have believed [[his]172-philip mother]307-his mother was blonde ? For [he]172-philip is brown all over - brown every inch of [him]172-philip . Ah , but how beautiful [he]172-philip is ! It was too late to go . [She]107-miss abbott could not tell why , but it was too late . [She]107-miss abbott turned away [her]107-miss abbott head when [Gino]144-gino lifted [[his]144-gino son]1368-his son to [his]144-gino lips . This was something too remote from the prettiness of [the nursery]1385-the nursery . [The man]370-the man was majestic ; [he]370-the man was a part of [Nature]202-nature ; in no ordinary love scene could [he]370-the man ever be so great . For a wonderful physical tie binds [the parents]1387-the parents to [the children]1388-the children ; and - by some sad , strange irony - it does not bind [[us]1389-we children]1390-us children to [[our]1389-we parents]1391-our parents . For if it did , if [we]1389-we could answer [their]1391-our parents love not with gratitude but with equal love , life would lose much of [its]1392-its pathos and much of its squalor , and [we]1389-we might be wonderfully happy . [Gino]144-gino passionately embracing , [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott reverently averting [her]107-miss abbott eyes - [both of [them]2379-both of them]2379-both of them had [parents whom [they]2379-both of them did not love so very much]1394-parents whom they did not love so very much .

[He]144-gino gave [her]107-miss abbott [[his]144-gino son]1368-his son without speaking , and [they]2379-both of them knelt side by side , tucking up [their]2379-both of them sleeves . [The child]250-the child had stopped crying , and [his]250-the child arms and legs were agitated by some overpowering joy . [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott had [a woman]406-a woman 's pleasure in cleaning anything - more especially when the thing was human . [She]107-miss abbott understood [little babies]1398-little babies from long experience in [a district]1399-a district , and [Gino]144-gino soon ceased to give [her]107-miss abbott directions , and only gave [her]107-miss abbott thanks .

" It is very kind of [you]107-miss abbott , "[144-gino] [he]144-gino murmured , " especially in [your]107-miss abbott beautiful dress . [He]250-the child is nearly clean already . Why , [I]144-gino take the whole morning ! There is so much more of [a baby]2063-a baby than [one]289-one expects . " [I]107-miss abbott am ready for a soft towel now , "[107-miss abbott] said [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott , who was strangely exalted by the service .

" Certainly ! certainly ! "[144-gino] [He]144-gino strode in a knowing way to a cupboard . But [he]144-gino had no idea where the soft towel was . Generally [he]144-gino dabbed [the baby]2072-the baby on the first dry thing [he]144-gino found .

" And if [you]107-miss abbott had any powder . "[144-gino]

[He]144-gino struck [his]144-gino forehead despairingly . Apparently the stock of powder was just exhausted .

[She]107-miss abbott sacrificed [her]107-miss abbott own clean handkerchief . [He]144-gino put a chair for [her]107-miss abbott on [the loggia]607-the loggia , which faced westward , and was still pleasant and cool . There [she]107-miss abbott sat , with twenty miles of view behind [her]107-miss abbott , and [he]144-gino placed [the dripping baby]1402-the dripping baby on [her]107-miss abbott knee . It shone now with health and beauty : it seemed to reflect light , like a copper vessel . [Just such a baby]1403-just such a baby [Bellini]203-bellini sets languid on [[his]203-bellini mother]307-his mother 's lap , or [Signorelli]204-signorelli flings wriggling on [pavements of marble]1405-pavements of marble , or [Lorenzo di Credi]205-lorenzo di credi , more reverent but less divine , lays carefully among flowers , with [his]205-lorenzo di credi head upon a wisp of golden straw . For a time [Gino]144-gino contemplated [them]1406-them standing . Then , to get a better view , [he]144-gino knelt by the side of the chair , with [his]144-gino hands clasped before [him]144-gino .

So [they]1406-them were when [Philip]172-philip entered , and saw , to all intents and purposes , [the Virgin and Child]1407-the virgin and child , with [Donor]206-donor .

" [Hullo]207-hullo ! "[144-gino] [he]144-gino exclaimed ; for [he]144-gino was glad to find things in such cheerful trim .

[She]1408-she burst into tears .

" What is it ? "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip kindly .

[She]1408-she tried to speak , and then went away weeping bitterly .

[The two men]1412-the two men stared at [each other]487-each other . By a common impulse [they]1412-the two men ran on to [the loggia]607-the loggia . [They]1412-the two men were just in time to see [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott disappear among the trees .

Chapter 8

" Mad ! "[102-harriet] screamed [Harriet]102-harriet , - " absolutely stark , staring , raving mad ! "[102-harriet]

[Philip]172-philip judged it better not to contradict [her]102-harriet .

" What 's [she]107-miss abbott here for ? Answer [me]144-gino that . What 's [she]107-miss abbott doing in [Monteriano]7-monteriano in [August]95-august ? "[144-gino]

[He]172-philip was unwise enough to reply , " [You]144-gino must n't accuse [her]107-miss abbott of that . Though [she]107-miss abbott is exasperating , [she]107-miss abbott has n't come here to betray [us]1418-us . "[172-philip]

" Then why has [she]107-miss abbott come [here]1844-here ? Answer [me]172-philip that . "[172-philip]

[He]172-philip made no answer . But fortunately [[his]172-philip sister]304-his sister was too much agitated to wait for one . " Bursting in on [me]304-his sister - crying and looking a disgusting sight - and says [she]107-miss abbott has been to see [the Italian]2070-the italian . Could n't even talk properly ; pretended [she]107-miss abbott had changed [her]107-miss abbott opinions . What are [her]107-miss abbott opinions to [us]1418-us ? [I]304-his sister was very calm . "[304-his sister] And [Harriet]102-harriet also burst into tears .

[Philip]172-philip governed [his]172-philip temper . [[His]172-philip sister]304-his sister was annoying , but quite reasonable in [her]304-his sister indignation . Moreover , [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott had behaved even worse than [she]304-his sister supposed .

" [I]304-his sister 've not got [the baby]2072-the baby , [Harriet]102-harriet , but at the same time [I]304-his sister have n't exactly failed . [I]304-his sister and [Signor Carella]131-signor carella are to have another interview this afternoon , at [the Caffe Garibaldi]62-the caffe garibaldi . [He]2072-the baby is perfectly reasonable and pleasant . Should [you]102-harriet be disposed to come with [me]304-his sister , [you]102-harriet would find [him]2072-the baby quite willing to discuss things . [He]2072-the baby is desperately in want of money , and has no prospect of getting any . [I]304-his sister discovered that . At the same time , [he]2072-the baby has a certain affection for [the child]250-the child . "[304-his sister] For [Philip]172-philip 's insight , or perhaps [his]172-philip opportunities , had not been equal to [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott 's .

[Harriet]102-harriet would only sob , and accuse [[her]102-harriet brother]1014-her brother of insulting [her]102-harriet ; how could [a lady]1911-a lady speak to [such a horrible man]1423-such a horrible man ? That , and nothing else , was enough to stamp [Caroline]107-miss abbott . Oh , poor [Lilia]100-lilia !

[Philip]172-philip drummed on the bedroom window - sill . [He]172-philip saw no escape from the deadlock . For though [he]172-philip spoke cheerfully about [his]172-philip second interview with [Gino]144-gino , [he]172-philip felt at the bottom of [his]172-philip heart that it would fail . [Gino]144-gino was too courteous : [he]144-gino would not break off negotiations by sharp denial ; [he]144-gino loved this civil , half - humorous bargaining . And [he]144-gino loved fooling [[his]144-gino opponent]1424-his opponent , and did it so nicely that [[his]144-gino opponent]1424-his opponent did not mind being fooled .

" [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott has behaved extraordinarily , "[172-philip] [he]172-philip said at last ; " but at the same time - "[172-philip]

[[His]172-philip sister]304-his sister would not hear [him]172-philip . [She]304-his sister burst forth again on the madness , the interference , the intolerable duplicity of [Caroline]107-miss abbott .

" [Harriet]102-harriet , [you]102-harriet must listen . [[My]304-his sister dear]1886-my dear , [you]102-harriet must stop crying . [I]304-his sister have something quite important to say . "[304-his sister]

" [I]304-his sister shall not stop crying , "[304-his sister] said [she]304-his sister . But in time , finding that [he]172-philip would not speak to [her]304-his sister , [she]304-his sister did stop .

" Remember that [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott has done [us]2453-us no harm . [She]107-miss abbott said nothing to [him]172-philip about the matter . [He]172-philip assumes that [she]107-miss abbott is working with [us]2453-us : [I]304-his sister gathered that . "[304-his sister]

" Well , [she]107-miss abbott is n't . "[304-his sister]

" Yes ; but if [you]172-philip 're careful [she]107-miss abbott may be . [I]304-his sister interpret [her]107-miss abbott behaviour thus : [She]107-miss abbott went to see [him]172-philip , honestly intending to get [the child]250-the child away . In the note [she]107-miss abbott left [me]304-his sister [she]107-miss abbott says so , and [I]304-his sister do n't believe [she]107-miss abbott 'd lie . "[304-his sister]

" [I]304-his sister do . "[304-his sister]

" When [she]107-miss abbott got [there]1769-there , there was some pretty domestic scene between [him]172-philip and [the baby]2072-the baby , and [she]107-miss abbott has got swept off in a gush of sentimentalism . " Disgusting ! "[304-his sister]

[Harriet]102-harriet 's ejaculations were more aggravating than the rest of [her]102-harriet . But [Philip]172-philip was averse to losing [his]172-philip temper . The access of joy that had come to [him]172-philip yesterday in [the theatre]629-the theatre promised to be permanent . [He]172-philip was more anxious than heretofore to be charitable towards [the world]1768-the world .

" If [you]172-philip want to carry off [the baby]2072-the baby , keep [your]172-philip peace with [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott . For if [she]107-miss abbott chooses , [she]107-miss abbott can help [you]172-philip better than [I]172-philip can . "[172-philip]

" There can be no peace between [me]102-harriet and [her]107-miss abbott , "[102-harriet] said [Harriet]102-harriet gloomily .

" Did [you]172-philip - "[172-philip]

" Oh , not all [I]172-philip wanted . [She]107-miss abbott went away before [I]172-philip had finished speaking - just like [those cowardly people]2459-those cowardly people ! - into [the church]282-the church . "[172-philip]

" Into [Santa Deodata]162-santa deodata 's ? "[172-philip]

" Yes ; [I]172-philip 'm sure [she]107-miss abbott needs it . Anything more unchristian - "[172-philip]

In time [Philip]172-philip went to [the church]282-the church also , leaving [[his]172-philip sister]304-his sister a little calmer and a little disposed to think over [his]172-philip advice . What had come over [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott ? [He]172-philip had always thought [her]107-miss abbott both stable and sincere . That conversation [he]172-philip had had with [her]107-miss abbott last Christmas in [the train]237-the train to [Charing Cross]1-charing cross - that alone furnished [him]172-philip with a parallel . For the second time , [Monteriano]7-monteriano must have turned [her]107-miss abbott head . [He]172-philip was not angry with [her]107-miss abbott , for [he]172-philip was quite indifferent to the outcome of [their]1432-their expedition . [He]172-philip was only extremely interested .

It was now nearly midday , and [the streets]1012-the streets were clearing . But the intense heat had broken , and there was a pleasant suggestion of rain . [The Piazza]564-the piazza , with [its]564-the piazza three great attractions - [the Palazzo Pubblico]1435-the palazzo pubblico , [the Collegiate Church]1986-the collegiate church , and [the Caffe Garibaldi]709-the caffe garibaldi : the intellect , the soul , and the body - had never looked more charming . For a moment [Philip]172-philip stood in [its]564-the piazza centre , much inclined to be dreamy , and thinking how wonderful it must feel to belong to [a city]685-a city , however mean . [He]172-philip was [here]1844-here , however , as [an emissary of civilization]1440-an emissary of civilization and as [a student of character]1441-a student of character , and , after a sigh , [he]172-philip entered [Santa Deodata 's]162-santa deodata to continue [his]172-philip mission .

There had been a FESTA two days before , and [the church]282-the church still smelt of incense and of garlic . [The little son of the sacristan]1443-the little son of the sacristan was sweeping [the nave]1058-the nave , more for amusement than for cleanliness , sending great clouds of dust over the frescoes and [the scattered worshippers]1445-the scattered worshippers . [The sacristan]1446-the sacristan [himself]1446-the sacristan had propped a ladder in the centre of the Deluge - which fills one of [the nave spandrels]1447-the nave spandrels - and was freeing a column from its wealth of scarlet calico . Much scarlet calico also lay upon the floor - for [the church]282-the church can look as fine as [any theatre]1449-any theatre - and [[the sacristan]1446-the sacristan 's little daughter]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter was trying to fold it up . [She]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter was wearing a tinsel crown . The crown really belonged to [St. Augustine]208-st. augustine . But it had been cut too big : it fell down over [his]208-st. augustine cheeks like a collar : [you]1452-you never saw anything so absurd . [One of [the canons]1988-the canons]1453-one of the canons had unhooked it just before the FIESTA began , and had given it to [[the sacristan]1446-the sacristan 's daughter]1456-the sacristan 's daughter .

" Please , "[172-philip] cried [Philip]172-philip , " is there [an English lady]2461-an english lady here ? "[172-philip]

[The man]370-the man 's mouth was full of tin - tacks , but [he]370-the man nodded cheerfully towards [a kneeling figure]1458-a kneeling figure . In the midst of this confusion [Miss Abbott]107-miss abbott was praying .

[He]172-philip was not much surprised : a spiritual breakdown was quite to be expected . For though [he]172-philip was growing more charitable towards [mankind]1459-mankind , [he]172-philip was still a little jaunty , and too apt to stake out beforehand the course that will be pursued by [the wounded soul]1460-the wounded soul . It did not surprise [him]172-philip , however , that [she]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter should greet [him]172-philip naturally , with none of the sour self - consciousness of [a person who had just risen from [her]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter knees]1461-a person who had just risen from her knees . This was indeed the spirit of [Santa Deodata]162-santa deodata 's , where a prayer to [God]112-god is thought none the worse of because it comes next to a pleasant word to [a neighbour]1462-a neighbour . " [I]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter am sure that [I]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter need it , "[1451-the sacristan 's little daughter] said [she]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter ; and [he]172-philip , who had expected [her]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter to be ashamed , became confused , and knew not what to reply .

" [I]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter 've nothing to tell [you]172-philip , "[1451-the sacristan 's little daughter] [she]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter continued . " [I]1451-the sacristan 's little daughter have simply changed straight round . But [he]1467-i did not move , for it was an increasing pleasure to [him]1467-i to be near [her]1468-her , and [her]1468-her charm was at its strongest today . " Perhaps [I]1483-i am extreme , "[1483-i] [she]1483-i said humbly . " [I]1483-i 've been trying to run [you]1484-he , just like [[your]1484-he mother]1866-your mother . [He]1484-he assented , but [her]1483-i remark had only an aesthetic value . [He]1484-he was not prepared to take it to [his]1484-he heart . It was not surprising , therefore , that the interview at [the Caffe Garibaldi]62-the caffe garibaldi came to nothing . [Neither of [them]1488-them]1487-neither of them took it very seriously . " Poor [Harriet]102-harriet ! "[172-philip] said [Philip]172-philip , swallowing the sugar . " One more wrench and it will all be over for [her]102-harriet ; [we]1494-them are leaving this evening . "[172-philip]

[They]1496-they watched [the departing figure of [Harriet]102-harriet]1497-the departing figure of harriet , and then entered upon the final civilities . [They]1496-they shook [each other]487-each other warmly by both hands . [Philip]172-philip was to come again next year , and to write beforehand . [He]172-philip was to be introduced to [[Gino]144-gino 's wife]1499-gino 's wife , for [he]172-philip was told of the marriage now . [He]172-philip was to be godfather to [[his]172-philip next baby]1500-his next baby .
